section: The duration of this Venture (the "Term") will begin on March 1, 2020 and continue in full force and effect until February 28, 2025, unless terminated earlier by mutual agreement of the Managers.
explanation: The Term of the joint venture is defined as starting on March 1, 2020, and ending on February 28, 2025. This establishes a specific duration for the venture. The term can only be changed by the managers, not by the members.

section: The Term may be extended with the unanimous consent of all Members.
explanation: Section 4 establishes that the agreement can only be terminated by the managers of the company. Section 5 establishes that the term can only be extended by the members of the company. These ideas contradict each other.

section: Each Member will be responsible for its respective duties as follows: Page 3 of 13 Member Duties Description BorrowMoney.com, inc *HTML code, build, deploy and maintain all technical aspect requirements including a database for medical dispatch personal & product service as needed, including activity information, data storage and backup. provided by three qualified assigned Borrowmoney.com, inc. employees/personal JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue From Awarded Contract, In Addition to The Total Contributions.
explanation: The listed duties for BorrowMoney.com, Inc. include the phrase "specified Description of duty*", but the asterisk suggests there should be a corresponding note or explanation further detailing or clarifying this description. The absence of this additional information creates a lack of clarity regarding the precise scope and nature of BorrowMoney.com's duty.

Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: The listed contribution for BorrowMoney.com, Inc. includes the phrase "specified Description of duty*", but the asterisk suggests there should be a corresponding note or explanation further detailing or clarifying this description. The absence of this additional information creates a lack of clarity regarding the precise scope and nature of BorrowMoney.com's duty.

section: The Managers will jointly decide major issues concerning the Venture. Where Managers are unable to reach agreement in deciding major issues, approval by a majority vote of the Managers will be required.
explanation: This section states that if the managers can not reach an agreement, then a majority vote will be required. However, earlier in the document in Section 8, it states that managers can only be appointed by a unanimous vote. This is a misalignment in the text.
